Package SpecificationCreation.look

Class Summary
ClassPane Displays the LIBER pop-up menu of the selected class, and enables the user to change this look and add specifications.
ClassTreeNode A node in the class or property tree.
LiberExample LiberExample shows an example of a LIBER feedbacktext about a particular class, generated with the * current version of the ontology and linguistic information.
LiberLabel LiberLabel is a label which is red or blue, and may pop up a menu when clicked.
SpecificationPane Shows a pane for creating a linguistic specification
TestAnchor Implements an anchor for generating an example feedback text
TreeRenderer Displays a little 'ok' icon before a tree node if its adaptation to LIBER has been completed.
TreeTransferHandler Handles drag and drop in property tree.
 

Exception Summary
CancelledException This exception is thrown when an anchor without relations is created
